content.en: Power quality improvement: Researchers are exploring the use of machine learning algorithms to improve the detection and classification of power quality disturbances in electrical systems. These algorithms, such as Long Short Term Memory (LSTM) and Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN), are being used to accurately detect and diagnose faults in power grids. Additionally, deep learning techniques are being applied to predict the occurrence of faults and classify different types of power quality events.
content.da: Strøm-kvalitetsforbedring: Forskere undersøger brugen af maskinlæringsalgoritmer til at forbedre detektion og klassifikation af strøm-kvalitetsforstyrrelser i elektriske systemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom Long Short Term Memory (LSTM) og Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN), bliver brugt til præcist at detektere og diagnosticere fejl i elnet. Derudover anvendes dyb læringsteknikker til at forudsige forekomsten af fejl og klassificere forskellige typer af strøm-kvalitetshændelser.
